subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mike Pelfrey’s mind and body worked in concert for a 4-2 win over the Cubs, with his fastball and slider reminding the Mets why they consider him a viable No. 2 starter.
snippet: Mike Pelfrey’s mind and body worked in concert for a 4-2 win over the Cubs, with his fastball and slider reminding the Mets why they consider him a viable No. 2 starter.
